name: Critical Journalism
description: The course examines the representation of race, gender, class and power in the media, traditional journalistic practices and newsroom culture. It will prepare students who wish to work in a media-related industry with a critical perspective towards understanding the marginalization of particular groups in the media.
prerequisites: 4.0 credits including ACMB01H3 and JOUA01H3 and JOUA02H3
